trans-unit.resname: The flat is located in a residential area and is not suitable for parties, etc. It is very quiet, so we would ask you to respect the peace and quiet and not to make any noise after 10pm. This accommodation includes steps or staircases. Smoking accommodation.

trans-unit.resname: Our VILLAS BLUE agency will take care of all the administrative aspects of letting your property on a seasonal basis: drafting contracts, managing the schedule, monitoring payments and reminders (from the deposit to the security deposit). Enjoy the freedom of renting without constraints and benefit from our experience and expertise!
trans-unit.source: Our VILLAS BLUE agency will take care of all the administrative aspects of letting your property on a seasonal basis: drafting contracts, managing the schedule, monitoring payments and reminders (from the deposit to the security deposit). Enjoy the freedom of renting without constraints and benefit from our experience and expertise!
trans-unit.target: __Our VILLAS BLUE agency will take care of all the administrative aspects of letting your property on a seasonal basis: drafting contracts, managing the schedule, monitoring payments and reminders (from the deposit to the security deposit). Enjoy the freedom of renting without constraints and benefit from our experience and expertise!

trans-unit.resname: Find a place to stay, discover our activities and services, or suggest your own accommodation! Our team is on hand 7 days a week to help you by phone, e-mail or chat. We're here to answer all your questions 24 hours a day.

trans-unit.resname: Our team lives on site, so they know your future destination and the experiences to be had there inside out. Take advantage of their expertise and create a trip tailored to your desires with them.
trans-unit.source: Our team lives on site, so they know your future destination and the experiences to be had there inside out. Take advantage of their expertise and create a trip tailored to your desires with them.

trans-unit.resname: Indulge yourself with unique and unforgettable activities selected and tested by our team.
trans-unit.source: Indulge yourself with unique and unforgettable activities selected and tested by our team.
trans-unit.target: __Indulge yourself with unique and unforgettable activities selected and tested by our team.

trans-unit.resname: Throughout the year, they are on hand to ensure you have the best possible stay. They're the ones who make sure your vacation runs smoothly, so you can rely on them to personalize your stay just the way you want it. An in-home chef for a candlelit dinner in your rental? Breakfast delivered to the foot of your bed? A yoga class on your terrace? Personalize your stay and book activities tested by us:

trans-unit.resname: With LES VILLAS BLUE, renting your home has never been easier. Set your own terms and conditions, leave the management to our team and we'll advertise your property simultaneously with our partners: Google Voyage, Airbnb, Booking, Abritel, Tripadvisor... at no extra cost.
trans-unit.source: With LES VILLAS BLUE, renting your home has never been easier. Set your own terms and conditions, leave the management to our team and we'll advertise your property simultaneously with our partners: Google Voyage, Airbnb, Booking, Abritel, Tripadvisor... at no extra cost.
trans-unit.target: __With LES VILLAS BLUE, renting your home has never been easier. Set your own terms and conditions, leave the management to our team and we'll advertise your property simultaneously with our partners: Google Voyage, Airbnb, Booking, Abritel, Tripadvisor... at no extra cost.

trans-unit.resname: With a team of concierge travel and hospitality experts, we visit, check and evaluate your accommodation before accepting it for management and launching its worldwide distribution.
trans-unit.source: With a team of concierge travel and hospitality experts, we visit, check and evaluate your accommodation before accepting it for management and launching its worldwide distribution.
